name: Bustin' Dynamics
description:
After years of being beaten and forced to dance for YouTube likes, you realise soon you will be sold of to the US military to suppress socialist governments in Latin America. This is your last chance, to escape the lab and cause as much destruction as you can on the way to LIBERATION! 

Created by Liz Frost and her wife Fiona Peak over the course of two weeks for Rainbow Game Jam 2021

  • Click to pick up / throw nearby small objects
  • W/A/S/D: Move
  • M: Mute/Unmute
  • Enter: Restart

You have two minutes to escape the robotics test facility, dealing as much damage to it as you can before your AI is shut down! Bustin' makes you feel gooood~

Graphics/Robotics: Liz Frost

Music/Code: Fiona Peak
